<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;RawError&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a573bcbbea76b4d72b33de1e392cc14aea8c4fdeb9f0256322a364cd1347a6ffd6">raw&#95;error&#95;code::corrupt&#95;file</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  ContainerLayout.SB = SB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize Free Page Map.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  ContainerLayout.FreePageMap.resize(SB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a1426565e730f0681edc1bfec6d59c5d5">NumBlocks</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Fpm exists either at block 1 or block 2 of the MSF.  However, this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allows for a maximum of getBlockSize() &#42; 8 blocks bits in the Fpm, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thusly an equal number of total blocks in the file.  For a block size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of 4KiB (very common), this would yield 32KiB total blocks in file, for a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximum file size of 32KiB &#42; 4KiB = 128MiB.  Obviously this won&#39;t do, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the Fpm is split across the file at &#96;getBlockSize()&#96; intervals.  As a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result, every block whose index is of the form |&#123;1,2&#125; + getBlockSize() &#42; k|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for any non-negative integer k is an Fpm block.  In theory, we only really</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to reserve blocks of the form |&#123;1,2&#125; + getBlockSize() &#42; 8 &#42; k|, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current versions of the MSF format already expect the Fpm to be arranged</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at getBlockSize() intervals, so we have to be compatible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See the function fpmPn() for more information:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-pdb/blob/master/PDB/msf/msf.cpp#L489</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FpmStream =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#aca02a882851c4f44d12552f22d5fb9d7">MappedBlockStream::createFpmStream</a>(ContainerLayout, &#42;Buffer, Allocator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader">BinaryStreamReader</a> FpmReader(&#42;FpmStream);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> FpmBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = FpmReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#a2d56063bcd6039c9372e485e609cf692">readBytes</a>(FpmBytes, FpmReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#a81b49f753bf7db44da6cf4b0fc59b76e">bytesRemaining</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t BlocksRemaining = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#a6717efb2ed642a2e4529323bf0a00923">getBlockCount</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t BI = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a9cf141c9194799e2fa2d92de4c6e8ff0aa245c3230debe5c956484ecc6fa93877">Byte</a> : FpmBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t BlocksThisByte = std::min(BlocksRemaining, 8U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; BlocksThisByte; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a9cf141c9194799e2fa2d92de4c6e8ff0aa245c3230debe5c956484ecc6fa93877">Byte</a> &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">        ContainerLayout.FreePageMap&#91;BI&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">      --BlocksRemaining;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++BI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  Reader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#ab56b001a0bd245c9e73972be0ac5d593">setOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#aa6c7f80408da2dff754296f55df4814a">getBlockMapOffset</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NumStreams = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Normally you can&#39;t use a MappedBlockStream without having fully parsed the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PDB file, because it accesses the directory and various other things, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is exactly what we are attempting to parse.  By specifying a custom</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subclass of IPDBStreamData which only accesses the fields that have already</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// been parsed, we can avoid this and reuse MappedBlockStream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DirectoryStream is cached in the class and thus lives for the life of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Wrapper around MappedBlockStream::createIndexedStream() that checks if a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stream with that index actually exists.  If it does not, the return value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will have an MSFError with code msf&#95;error&#95;code::no&#95;stream.  Else, the return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="comment">/// value will contain the stream returned by createIndexedStream().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MappedBlockStream&gt;</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#a2b840dcb0c3ba0d43c8c847fb0327a06"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#a2b840dcb0c3ba0d43c8c847fb0327a06">PDBFile::safelyCreateIndexedStream</a>(uint32&#95;t StreamIndex)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StreamIndex &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#acbe37375302fbacce34adab97d775a4a">getNumStreams</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
